metadata.dc:author: Collado-Ortiz, Miguel Angel
Padrón-García, Ana Lucía
Achirica-Uvalle, Marisol
metadata.dc:description: We reviewed 237 cases of children with cleft lip and/or palate from the Department of Human Communication. Sociodemographic data, diagnoses, surgeries, family structure, family problems reported, psychological evaluation, conduct report, disabilities and emotional indicators were all considered. All these categories are reviewed from a systemic perspective in which each is directly inter-related and directly responsible (along with other factors that must be researched) for the outcome and well being of the patient.
metadata.dc:title: Caracterización de una población pediátrica con labio y paladar hendidos.
[Characterization of children with cleft lip or palate].
